meanings.definition: The act of burying a dead body.
meanings.sent1: The inhumation of the deceased was a solemn event.
meanings.sent2: After the inhumation, the family gathered to pay their respects.
meanings.sent3: The inhumation took place under a clear blue sky, as if the heavens were watching.
meanings.sent4: The inhumation was a final embrace of the earth, returning the body to its origins.
meanings.sent5: The inhumation marked the end of a life's journey, a peaceful rest among the soil.

meanings.sent1: The inhumation of the treasure was a secret known only to a few.
meanings.sent2: The inhumation of the city's history lay hidden beneath the modern buildings.
meanings.sent3: The inhumation of the old memories was like burying a time capsule for the future.
meanings.sent4: The inhumation of the past was a weight carried by the present generation.
meanings.sent5: The inhumation of the truth was a burial of lies, waiting to be uncovered.
